casebody.data:
HARRELL
v.
Warden MENIFEE. No. 180P07-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 23, 2007. Robert Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of NC.

Prior report: ___ N.C. ___, 645 S.E.2d 381.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 18th day of June 2007 by Plaintiff for Rehearing En Banc:

*604"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 23rd day of August 2007."
